name: .ACCDT File Extension
summary: Learn about .ACCDT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Template database file created by Microsoft Access, a desktop relational database management system (RDMBS); contains pre-defined tables, data, reports, and other database elements; saved as a hierarchy of XML and text files and compressed with Zip compression.

content: ACCDT files are used for creating multiple .ACCDB databases from the same starting point. They also can be useful for partitioning information between applications that use similarly structured data.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
